TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 状态栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows status bar control.

summary.span: 此类在 .NET 5.0 及更高版本中不可用。

span.span: This class is not available in .NET 5.0 and later versions.

summary.span: 改为使用 控件，该控件替换并扩展 控件。

span.span: Use the control instead, which replaces and extends the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类在 .NET 5.0 及更高版本中不可用。This class is not available in .NET 5.0 and later versions. 请改用 控件。Use the control instead. 通常， 控件由对象组成 ，每个对象都显示文本和/或图标。Typically, a control consists of objects, each of which displays text and/or an icon. 还可以提供所有者描述的面板来提供自定义面板，如进度栏或一系列用于显示应用程序状态的图像。You can also provide owner-drawn panels to provide custom panels such as a progress bar or a series of images that displays the state of your application. 控件通常会显示有关正在其上查看的对象 、对象的组件或与应用程序中该对象的操作相关的上下文信息的信息。A control typically displays information about an object being viewed on a , the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application. 控件提供使您能够自定义控件外观的属性。The control provides properties that enable you to customize the appearance of the control. 如果在 可调整大小的窗体上显示，则可以使用 属性在窗体右下角显示大小调整手柄以向用户指示窗体可以调整大小。If the is displayed on a form that can be resized, you can use the property to display a sizing grip in the lower-right corner of the form to indicate to users that the form can be resized. 属性使您可以在或中显示面板， 以便仅显示控件的属性的值 。The property enables you to display panels within your or to display only the value of the property of the control. 默认 没有面板。The default has no panels. 若要向添加面板， 可以使用 通过控件的属性可访问的类的方法 。To add panels to a you can use the method of the class that is accessible through the property of the control. 你还可以使用 通过属性提供的对象 从控件中删除面板，并访问特定的 以操作面板。You can also use the object provided through the property to remove panels from the control and access a specific to manipulate the panel. 若要确定何时 单击控件中的对象 ，可以为事件创建事件处理程序 。If you want to determine when a object within a control is clicked, you can create an event handler for the event. 若要在面板上执行所有者描述操作，可以为事件创建事件处理程序 。To perform owner-draw operations on a panel, you can create an event handler for the event. 传递给事件处理程序的事件数据提供有关要绘制的面板的信息，以及用于 执行绘图任务的对象。The event data passed to the event handler provides information on the panel to draw and a object to use to perform drawing tasks. 创建的实例时 ，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一个 名为的对象 `panel1` 显示应用程序的状态文本。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个 名为的 `panel2` ，它显示当前日期，并使用 类的属性 来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用和 属性访问 的方法 以将面板添加到中 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、 、 和 属性对对象进行初始化 。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例要求在的构造函数中定义并调用在此示例中定义的方法 。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 没有面板。The default has no panels. 创建的实例时 ，以下读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||`false`| ||`true`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 并使用 、 、 、 和 成员以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a and use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. `InitializeStatusBarPanels`在窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此控件是否使用次要缓冲区重绘其图面以降低或避免闪烁，但此属性对 控件没有影响。

value.span: 如果控件具有次要缓冲区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control has a secondary buffer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性对控件没有影响 ，因此它不会显示在设计器或 IntelliSense 中。Setting this property has no effect on the control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DrawItem As StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler

summary.span: 当所有者描述的状态栏控件的可视特征发生变化时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn status bar control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此事件在所有者描述的控件中执行绘制操作 。You can use this event to perform drawing operations in an owner-drawn control. 例如，如果显示一个显示进度栏的所有者描述， 则可以使用此事件在面板上绘制进度栏。For example, if you display an owner-drawn that displays a progress bar, you can use this event to perform the drawing of the progress bar on the panel. 通过 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的对象提供给事件的数据使您能够确定需要绘制的面板以及 要用于绘制到面板的面板。The data provided to the event through the object passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the panel that needs to be drawn and the to use to draw to the panel. 仅当 控件中的的属性 设置为时，才引发此事件 。This event is only raised when the property of a in a control is set to . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 用于显示自定义背景和当前日期的所有者描述。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn that displays a custom background and the current date. 此示例要求将控件的事件连接 到在示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that you have connected the event of a control to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 用于显示自定义背景和当前日期的所有者描述。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn that displays a custom background and the current date. 此示例要求将控件的事件连接 到在示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that you have connected the event of a control to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关概述，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PanelClick As StatusBarPanelClickEventHandler

summary.span: 当单击 控件上的 对象时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a object on a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的面板时，可以使用此事件来执行任务 。You can use this event to perform tasks when a panel within a control is clicked. 通过作为参数传递给事件处理程序的提供给事件的数据 使您能够确定 用户单击的，以便在选定面板上执行任务。The data provided to the event through the passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the that was clicked by the user in order to perform tasks on the selected panel. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、 、 、 和 成员以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. `InitializeStatusBarPanels`在窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Panels As StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection

summary.span: 获取控件中所包含的 面板集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of panels contained within the control.

value.span: 包含 控件的 对象的 。

span.span: A containing the objects of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示多个面板来向应用程序的用户提供信息。The control can display a number of panels to provide information to the user of your application. 例如，面板可能显示当前时间或文件下载进度。For example, a panel could display the current time or the progress of a file download. 控件显示的每个面板 都是类的实例 。Each panel displayed by the control is an instance of the class. 属性使你能够获取对 当前存储在控件中的对象的集合的引用 。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the collection of objects that are currently stored in the control. 通过此引用，你可以添加面板、删除面板、访问集合中的特定面板，还可以获取控件中的面板的计数 。With this reference, you can add panels, remove panels, access a specific panel within the collection, and obtain a count of the panels in the control. 有关可以通过 panel 集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅 类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the panel collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一个 名为的对象 `panel1` 显示应用程序的状态文本。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个 名为 `panel2` 的对象显示当前日期，并使用 类的属性 来显示当前时间。The second object, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用和 属性访问 的方法 以将面板添加到中 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、 、 和 属性对对象进行初始化 。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例要求在的构造函数中定义并调用在此示例中定义的方法 。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示已添加到控件中的任何面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any panels that have been added to the control are displayed.

value.span: 如果显示面板，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if panels are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件在没有任何面板的情况下显示其属性的值 。By default, the control displays the value of its property without any panels. 当 `ShowPanels` 设置为时 `true` ，将 显示在控件中指定的任何对象 。When `ShowPanels` is set to `true`, any objects specified in the control are displayed. 创建类的实例时，最初不创建任何面板 。No panels are initially created when you create an instance of the class. 您可以使用类的方法将面板添加到 控件 。You can add panels to a control by using the method of the class. 可以通过的属性访问此集合类 。This collection class can be accessed through the property of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例 在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一个 名为的对象 `panel1` 显示应用程序的状态文本。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个 名为的 `panel2` ，它显示当前日期，并使用 类的属性 来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用和 属性访问 的方法 以将面板添加到中 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、 、 和 属性对对象进行初始化 。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例要求在的构造函数中定义并调用在此示例中定义的方法 。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在控件的右下角显示大小调整手柄。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing grip is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.

value.span: 如果显示大小调整手柄，则值为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if a sizing grip is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性来显示大小调整手柄，以便在调整窗体大小时向用户提供指示。You can use this property to display a sizing grip to provide an indication to the user when a form is resizable. 如果将的 属性 设置为无法调整大小的边框样式（如 或）， 则应将属性设置为， `false` 以防止用户认为窗体可以调整大小。If the property of your is set to a border style that is not resizable, such as or , you should set the property to `false` to prevent the user from thinking that the form can be resized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、 、 、 和 成员以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. `InitializeStatusBarPanels`在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序中调用方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示控件显示的文本。This property represents the text displayed by the control. > [!CAUTION] > 控件仅显示字符串的前127个字符。The control displays only the first 127 characters of a string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. `InitializeSimpleStatusBar`在窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeSimpleStatusBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
